items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

items.name: Fruit Tart
items.description: Buttery tart shell filled with custard and topped with fresh seasonal fruits.

items.name: Steak
items.description: A juicy grilled steak served with garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Grilled Chicken
items.description: Tender grilled chicken breast marinated in herbs and spices.

items.name: Salmon
items.description: Pan-seared salmon fillet served with lemon butter sauce.

items.name: Sampler Platter
items.description: A delicious assortment of mini spring rolls, chicken wings, and mozzarella sticks.

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted baguette slices topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

items.name: Spinach Dip
items.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served with tortilla chips.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Classic spaghetti with creamy carbonara sauce, bacon, and parmesan cheese.

items.name: Penne Primavera
items.description: Penne pasta tossed with fresh vegetables in a light olive oil and garlic sauce.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Grilled chicken and fettuccine pasta in a rich alfredo sauce.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese with Caesar dressing.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese with Greek vinaigrette.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Slices of ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil with balsamic glaze.
